channel.title: Package-Manager on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Package-Manager on Arrans github.io

item.title: microsoft/winget-cli
item.description: WinGet is the Windows Package Manager. This project includes a CLI (Command Line Interface), PowerShell modules, and a COM (Component Object Model) API (Application Programming Interface).

item.title: pkgforge/soar
item.description: A fast, modern package manager for Static Binaries, Portable Formats (AppImage|AppBundle|FlatImage|Runimage) & More [maintainer=@QaidVoid]

item.title: arran4/kde-keyboard-shortcuts
item.description: A quick and simple installer for my kde keyboard bindings in system, as a deb/rpm file
